    • Constructor Detail

      • Gun

        public Gun(double damage,
           int range,
           double fireRate,
           double speed,
           int ID,
           boolean canHold,
           int sprayRange,
           int bulletCount)
        Creates a custom Gun object that deals certain damage, can fire upto a particular range, shoots bullets at a rate, with a unique ID
        Parameters:
        damage - the damage the weapon can deal
        range - the range of the weapon
        bulletCount - the amount of bullets held by the gun
        fireRate - a double representing the number of fires the gun can perform per second.
        speed - the speed the bullet travels
        ID - the ID of the weapon
        canHold - whether the Gun holder can hold this Gun
        sprayRange - the distance the Gun can fire

      • Gun

        public Gun(double damage,
           int range,
           double fireRate,
           double speed,
           int ID,
           boolean canHold)
        Creates a custom Gun object that deals certain damage, can fire upto a particular range, shoots bullets at a rate, with a unique ID
        Parameters:
        damage - the damage dealt by this gun
        range - the range of the gun
        fireRate - the rate at which this gun fires
        speed - the bullet speed of this gun
        ID - the ID of this gun

      • fireBullet

        public void fireBullet(double x,
                       double y,
                       double direction,
                       boolean isGood)
        Fires a bullet from this weapon that travels across the screens.
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate of this weapon
        y - the y coordinate of this weapon
        direction - the direction of this weapon
        isGood - whether the bullet hits the opposition entity
